ej,gardb101,M,barnl901,Call at 1B ej,lemoj101,C,merrd901,Call at 3B Twins manager Billy Gardner ejected by 1B umpire Larry Barnett sometime in game Twins coach Jim Lemon ejected by 3B umpire Durwood Merrill sometime in game

ej,lemoc001,P,reilm901,Charging mound after HBP $Chet Lemon hit on the wrist by a Pete Redfern fast ball; Lemon charged the mound and both benches cleared; Lemon ejected by HP umpire Mike Reilly; Redfern left after being stepped on during the brawl

ej,cabee001,P,reilm901,Charging mound after brushback ej,hebnr001,P,reilm901,Fighting after brushback pitch ej,davir001,P,reilm901,Fighting ej,vegaj101,P,reilm901,Fighting $Enos Cabell was brushed back by Ron Davis; when Cabell made threatening gestures at Davis, HP umpire Mike Reilly attempted to hold back Cabell; Cabell broke away and met Davis halfway to the mound; both benches cleared and a brawl ensued; Cabell, Davis, Richie Hebner and Jose Vega ejected by Reilly; pitcher Dave Rozema was carried off the field with severe ligament damage to his left knee and underwent surgery later
